Uses of Interface
io.jstach.jstachio.context.ContextNode

Packages that use ContextNode
Package
Description
io.jstach.jstachio.context
JStachio extended Mustache context support for context stack as well as Map and JSON tree like models.

  • Uses of ContextNode in io.jstach.jstachio.context

    Methods in io.jstach.jstachio.context that return ContextNode
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default @Nullable ContextNode
    ContextNode.find(String field)
    Will search up the tree for a field starting at this nodes children first.
    default @Nullable ContextNode
    ContextNode.get(String field)
    Gets a field from a Map if ContextNode is wrapping one.
    default @Nullable ContextNode
    ContextNode.ofChild(int index, @Nullable Object o)
    Creates an indexed child node off of this node where the return child nodes parent will be this node.
    default @Nullable ContextNode
    ContextNode.ofChild(String name, @Nullable Object o)
    Creates a named child node off of this node where the return child nodes parent will be this node.
    static @Nullable ContextNode
    ContextNode.ofRoot(@Nullable Object o)
    Creates the root node which has no name.
    default @Nullable ContextNode
    ContextNode.parent()
    The parent node.
    Methods in io.jstach.jstachio.context that return types with arguments of type ContextNode
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default Iterator<ContextNode>
    ContextNode.iterator()
    If the node is a Map or a non iterable/array a singleton iterator will be returned.
